body:
friend's birthday party at another friend's house

varied, comfortable, and plentiful party seating options

well-kept shag carpet

playing with a friendly corgi

passing a joint around a balcony 

my first takoyaki: such layers of texture and flavor, 

finding out something surprising about an acquaintance's sex life

corn, butter, cotija cheese, chili powder, lime juice

successfully assembled an ikea bookcase

meditated today, yesterday, and the day before (thanks to j for recommending the \`1 giant mind\` app)

caught up (partially) on _the new yorker_

the atrocious alt-j t-shirt that antoni is wearing in this episode of _queer eye_

we have a gas stove again, after two years without

a vent hood that actually works for once

miso has mostly been sweet (sweetso) today

having reread _the three body problem_ trilogy yet again in advance of reading this fan-fic novel ([https://us.macmillan.com/books/9781250306029](https://us.macmillan.com/books/9781250306029))

breeze through the window in the living room

hanging out with deborah

hanging out with deborah
